definitions.definition: An elevated location smaller than a mountain.
definitions.example: The park is sheltered from the wind by a hill to the east.
You need to pick up speed to get up the hill that's coming up.

definitions.definition: A heap of earth surrounding a plant.
A single cluster or group of plants growing close together, and having the earth heaped up about them.
definitions.example: a hill of corn or potatoes

definitions.definition: To form into a heap or mound.
To heap or draw earth around plants.
